text: Phyla, the plural of phylum, may refer to: * Phylum, a biological taxon between Kingdom and Class * by analogy, in linguistics, a large division of possibly related languages, or a major language family which is not subordinate to another Phyla, as a singular, may refer to: * Phyla (genus), a genus of plants in the family Verbenaceae * Phyla-Vell, a Marvel Comics superhero
title: Phyla
